Constructor Detail

BoardMatrix

protected BoardMatrix(BoardMatrix.Size _size)
Create a board by manually specifying the size: use Rules.createBoard() to create a board of the appropriate size for the rules in question.

Parameters:
_size - Initialiser for BoardMatrix.size attribute. This is used to allocate memory for the 2-dimensional array where representing the board state.

BoardMatrix

public BoardMatrix(org.w3c.dom.Node board_node)
Create a board by parsing the 'board' node of an XML document: no error protected is provided by the function so use it carefully!

Parameters:
board_node - The Document Object Model (DOM) node to be parsed in order to create the BoardMatrix object.
Method Detail

pieceToPlayer

public static Game.Player pieceToPlayer(BoardMatrix.Cell c)
Parameters:
c - A BoardMatrix.Cell enumeration case (ex: Board.Cell.PIECE_WHITE).
Returns:
The corresponding Game.Player enumeration case (ex: Game.Player.WHITE) or null if there is no such case.

playerToPiece

public static BoardMatrix.Cell playerToPiece(Game.Player p)
Parameters:
p - A Game.Player enumeration case (ex: Game.Player.WHITE).
Returns:
The corresponding BoardMatrix.Cell enumeration case (ex: Board.Cell.PIECE_WHITE) or null is there is no such case.

parseCells

public final void parseCells(org.w3c.dom.Node board_node)
Modify (don't resize) the contents of a board by parsing the 'board' node of an XML document: no error protection is provided by the function so use it carefully!

Parameters:
board_node - The Document Object Model (DOM) node to be parsed in order to modify the BoardMatrix object.

clear

public void clear()
Clear the board: set all cells to Cell.EMPTY.

setCell

public BoardMatrix.Cell setCell(BoardMatrix.Position p,
                                BoardMatrix.Cell new_value)
Change the contents of a specific cell.

Parameters:
p - The position on the board to be modified.
new_value - The new contents of the cell.
Returns:
The previous value of the cell, before it was modified, or Cell.OUT_OF_BOUNDS if the specified position was invalid.

setCellOwner

public Game.Player setCellOwner(BoardMatrix.Position p,
                                Game.Player new_owner)
Change the owner of a specific cell to

Parameters:
p - The position on the board to be modified.
new_owner - The new owner of the cell.
Returns:
The previous owner of the cell or null if the specified position was invalid.

copy

public BoardMatrix copy()
Create a copy of the message receiver (this).

Returns:
A deep copy of the object, with the same size and contents.

getSize

public BoardMatrix.Size getSize()
Returns:
The size of the board, as an inner-class 'Size' structure with n_rows and n_cols fields.

get_n_cells

public int get_n_cells()
Returns:
The total number of cells, so the number of rows times the number of columns.

count_player_pieces

public int count_player_pieces(Game.Player player)
Parameters:
player - The player whose pieces we'll be counting, or null.
Returns:
The total number of pieces owned by the specified player (the number of empty cells if null is specified).

count_pieces

public int count_pieces()
Returns:
The total number of pieces on the board, so belonging to either player.

getCell

public BoardMatrix.Cell getCell(BoardMatrix.Position p)
Parameters:
p - The position on the board we want to know the contents of.
Returns:
The contents of the specified cell, or Cell.OUT_OF_BOUNDS is the position given is invalid.

getCellOwner

public Game.Player getCellOwner(BoardMatrix.Position p)
Parameters:
p - The position on the board we want to know the owner of.
Returns:
The player who owns the specified cell, or null if the position is invalid or the cell has no owner.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object other)
Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
other - The object to compare this one with.
Returns:
True if and only if the other object is a BoardMatrix with an identical size and contents.

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Overrides:
hashCode in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
Hash function representative of the equals operator (size and cell contents must be identical).

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
An XML 'board' tag containing the board information (size, number of pieces and contents of each cell).

toConsole

public java.lang.String toConsole()
Returns:
A grid of characters representing the board in a more human-readable way.
  • '*' = white piece
  • '@' = black piece
  • '-' = empty cell
